Trade/Device Name(s): First Sign Multi-Drug Dip Card Test
First Sign Drug of Abuse Dip Card Test Marijuana
First Sign Drug of Abuse Cup Test Marijuana
Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and cocaine metabolites test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for First Sign Multi-Drug Dip Card Test, Cup Test, and Drug of Abuse tests for marijuana, amphetamine, cocaine, and methamphetamine in urine using lateral flow immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of amphetamine, cocaine, and methamphetamine (multi-drug tests, OTC) and marijuana (marijuana tests, prescription use only) in human urine as an in vitro diagnostic, providing preliminary results requiring confirmation.
